title: Creamy Kielbasa and Potato Soup
ingredients: 1 stalk celery, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
3/4 pound kielbasa sausage, sliced into 1/2 inch pieces
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
instructions: In a large pot over medium heat, combine potatoes, onion, celery, beef broth, chicken broth, and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, 15 minutes. Stir in sausage and condensed soup and continue to simmer until heated though and slightly thickened. Season with pepper. Serve hot.
